titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to release a reversionary interest of the United States in certain land located in Putnam County, Florida, and to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain mineral interests of the United States in such land to the State of Florida.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Forest, Family Farms, and Energy.
Subcommittee Hearings Held.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended).
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported to House (Amended) by House Committee on Agriculture. Report No: 100-65.
Placed on Union Calendar No: 50.
Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs Sequentially, for a Period Ending not Later than Apr 25, 87.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.
Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands Discharged.
House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.

vote.text: Passed House (Amended) by Yea-Nay Vote: 374 - 0 (Record Vote No: 144).

action.text: Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department, Agriculture Department, OMB.
Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources received executive comment from Agriculture Department. Favorable.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston without amendment. With written report No. 100-181.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 344.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Measure Signed in Senate.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 5/27/1987--Passed House amended. (Measure passed House, amended, roll call #144 (374-0)) Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to release a reversionary interest of the United States in specified land in Putnam County, Florida, in exchange for the State of Florida agreeing to a similar restriction on other specified lands. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey U.S. mineral rights in the original, restricted lands. Requires the State of Florida to pay fair market value and administrative and other costs for the conveyance of such mineral interests.
